title: JSON content for the projects page

content.name: Projects
content.desc: Here's a selection of projects I've been working on

content.name: Bellum Mechanica
content.desc: Design an engine capable of automating robo-warfare, then direct your bots to victory against other player-written AI. Inspired by chess, autochess & Battlesnakes

content.name: An Imperial Simulation
content.desc: A strategy game about simulation, artifacts and empires. Raise a settlement from the dirt and conquer beyond the known world.

content.name: AloeCMS
content.desc: A lightweight, detail-oriented CMS built in Typescript

content.name: Mnemonist
content.desc: A guided language learning platform that encourages users to develop their knowledge by treating it as a database.

content.name: SpawnerJS
content.desc: A functional-style framework for building Javascript UIs
